rmangal 1.6.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

as.igraph()

Coerce mgNetworksCollection or mgNetwork objects to igraph objects

avail_type()

List interactions type contains in mangal-db

get_citation()

Get a BibTeX entry for all publications in a givem networks collection.

get_collection()

Get a collection of networks

get_network_by_id() get_network_by_id_indiv()

Retrieve mangal network by id

search_datasets()

Search over all datasets using keyword

search_interactions()

Search for specific interactions type (e.g. mutualism)

search_networks()

Search over all networks using keyword or spatial object

search_reference()

Search for a specific dataset reference with its DOI

search_taxa()

Search network by taxa using keyword, tsn, eol, bold or ncbi IDs.

  • All functions
